title:
I read a article on Fox News yesterday stating the United States sends 1.2 billion dollars to Egypt every year.

With the financial problems facing the United States, why to we send this money to countryäó»s that are financially well off?
text:
The focus of MyReporter.com is answering questions about life in
Coastal North Carolina. That's where we devote our resources.
Unfortunately, your question does not meet that criteria.
